an3.62:1.1: “Tinimani, bhikkhave, amataputtikani bhayaniti assutava puthujjano bhasati.
an3.62:1.3: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yam mahaaggidaho vutthati.
an3.62:1.4: Mahaaggidahe kho pana, bhikkhave, vutthite tena gamapi dayhanti nigamapi dayhanti nagarapi dayhanti.
an3.62:1.5: Gamesupi dayhamanesu nigamesupi dayhamanesu nagaresupi dayhamanesu tattha matapi puttam nappatilabhati, puttopi mataram nappatilabhati.
an3.62:1.6: Idam, bhikkhave, pathamam amataputtikam bhayanti assutava puthujjano bhasati.
an3.62:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo yam mahamegho vutthati.
an3.62:2.2: Mahameghe kho pana, bhikkhave, vutthite mahaudakavahako sanjayati.
an3.62:2.3: Mahaudakavahake kho pana, bhikkhave, sanjayante tena gamapi vuyhanti nigamapi vuyhanti nagarapi vuyhanti.
an3.62:2.4: Gamesupi vuyhamanesu nigamesupi vuyhamanesu nagaresupi vuyhamanesu tattha matapi puttam nappatilabhati, puttopi mataram nappatilabhati.
an3.62:2.5: Idam, bhikkhave, dutiyam amataputtikam bhayanti assutava puthujjano bhasati.
an3.62:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo yam bhayam hoti atavisankopo, cakkasamarulha janapada pariyayanti.
an3.62:3.2: Bhaye kho pana, bhikkhave, sati atavisankope cakkasamarulhesu janapadesu pariyayantesu tattha matapi puttam nappatilabhati, puttopi mataram nappatilabhati.
an3.62:3.3: Idam, bhikkhave, tatiyam amataputtikam bhayanti assutava puthujjano bhasati.
an3.62:3.4: Imani kho, bhikkhave, tini amataputtikani bhayaniti assutava puthujjano bhasati.
an3.62:4.1: Tani kho panimani, bhikkhave, tini samataputtikaniyeva bhayani amataputtikani bhayaniti assutava puthujjano bhasati.
an3.62:4.3: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yam mahaaggidaho vutthati.
an3.62:4.4: Mahaaggidahe kho pana, bhikkhave, vutthite tena gamapi dayhanti nigamapi dayhanti nagarapi dayhanti.
an3.62:4.5: Gamesupi dayhamanesu nigamesupi dayhamanesu nagaresupi dayhamanesu hoti so samayo yam kadaci karahaci matapi puttam patilabhati, puttopi mataram patilabhati.
an3.62:4.6: Idam, bhikkhave, pathamam samataputtikamyeva bhayam amataputtikam bhayanti assutava puthujjano bhasati.
an3.62:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo yam mahamegho vutthati.
an3.62:5.2: Mahameghe kho pana, bhikkhave, vutthite mahaudakavahako sanjayati.
an3.62:5.3: Mahaudakavahake kho pana, bhikkhave, sanjate tena gamapi vuyhanti nigamapi vuyhanti nagarapi vuyhanti.
an3.62:5.4: Gamesupi vuyhamanesu nigamesupi vuyhamanesu nagaresupi vuyhamanesu hoti so samayo yam kadaci karahaci matapi puttam patilabhati, puttopi mataram patilabhati.
an3.62:5.5: Idam, bhikkhave, dutiyam samataputtikamyeva bhayam amataputtikam bhayanti assutava puthujjano bhasati.
an3.62:6.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo yam bhayam hoti atavisankopo, cakkasamarulha janapada pariyayanti.
an3.62:6.2: Bhaye kho pana, bhikkhave, sati atavisankope cakkasamarulhesu janapadesu pariyayantesu hoti so samayo yam kadaci karahaci matapi puttam patilabhati, puttopi mataram patilabhati.
an3.62:6.3: Idam, bhikkhave, tatiyam samataputtikamyeva bhayam amataputtikam bhayanti assutava puthujjano bhasati.
an3.62:6.4: Imani kho, bhikkhave, tini samataputtikaniyeva bhayani amataputtikani bhayaniti assutava puthujjano bhasati.
an3.62:7.4: Na, bhikkhave, mata puttam jiramanam evam labhati:
an3.62:7.6: putto va pana mataram jiramanam na evam labhati:
an3.62:8.1: Na, bhikkhave, mata puttam byadhiyamanam evam labhati:
an3.62:8.3: putto va pana mataram byadhiyamanam na evam labhati:
an3.62:9.1: Na, bhikkhave, mata puttam miyamanam evam labhati:
an3.62:9.3: putto va pana mataram miyamanam na evam labhati:
an3.62:9.5: Imani kho, bhikkhave, tini amataputtikani bhayaniti.
an3.62:10.1: Atthi, bhikkhave, maggo atthi patipada imesanca tinnam samataputtikanam bhayanam imesanca tinnam amataputtikanam bhayanam pahanaya samatikkamaya samvattati.
an3.62:10.2: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, maggo katama ca patipada imesanca tinnam samataputtikanam bhayanam imesanca tinnam amataputtikanam bhayanam pahanaya samatikkamaya samvattati?
an3.62:10.4: sammaditthi, sammasankappo, sammavaca, sammakammanto, sammaajivo, sammavayamo, sammasati, sammasamadhi.
an3.62:10.5: Ayam kho, bhikkhave, maggo ayam patipada imesanca tinnam samataputtikanam bhayanam imesanca tinnam amataputtikanam bhayanam pahanaya samatikkamaya samvattati”ti.
